name: Help Me, Help You!
description:
My first complete game, made in a week or so. You play as two HeartPeople that have to cooperate, in order to espace from a cave they find themselves trapped into. A short experience designed to introduce people that have little to no experience with videogames into the world of gaming.

It is recommended that an experienced player should take the Blue character while a less experienced one, the Orange. However, this not necessary for the game to be playable.

Consider sharing this project if you enjoyed it or leaving feedback, as it will be helpful on future games.

Huge thanks to these amazing content creators

  • Heartbeast's Channel for providing helpful tutorials and art assets
  • Tad Miller and Bertsz for composing beautiful open licenced music
  • Jon K. Fite for providing well made sound effects
